name: EVOC Multi Frame Pack
description: A frame bag for hardtails and FS bikes. This zippered bag sits securely in your frame, adding useful storage on longer rides.140/500-denier fabric with a PU coating is durable and weather-resistant.Velcro® attachment loops let you secure the bag in the frame below the top tube or above the BB.YKK® Vislon zipper with polyurethane coating seals out the weather.Internal mesh pockets keep you organized.Included: frame protective stickers.Compatible with hardtail or FS bikes.
